acidity.notes: Juicy, very focused tart nuance like the skin of a plum.

sweetness.notes: Golden, sugary, ripe, spices. This cup tastes well balanced — I just don't like the combination of a raw plum and cooking spices. They seem incongruent — like mixing a cool, refreshing summer taste with a warm, winter weather taste.

finish.notes: Aftertaste lingers then fades to a somewhat neutral, tea-like mouthfeel. No strong metallic or acidic tastes.

flavor: Complex, creamy, emphasis on cool plum juice and warm spices. I'm starting to like this, though the combo is unusual.
notes: 8 second vigorous bloom swirl. Drawdown was consistent.
